text: I've just sailed 260 nautical miles to see my mate who's just bought a boat exactly like I did
Thank you all for being here
What a morning, we've got no winds. We've got like three knots or something.
Oh nice one!
Last time on SLV we had left from La Grande-Motte, the home of La Vagabonde for a Shakedown cruise
It was day two of our trip and we were on our way to Majorca in the Balearic Islands
Having lost all wind from the previous day, it was time to put our Code Zero up.
Anything over 12 knots apparent and we take it down. You can feel how light it was.
Perfect what we're doing now.

Lunch on the bow.
[Doesn't get much better than this]
We just rolled out all three sails
we got the Code Zero up but it's blowing up above 12,
so we're going to wind it in.
I swear I'm the only one who bothers to take videos at night. I'm on watch, clearly, sitting outside.
There's a lot of ships around. We're about...
...25 nautical miles from our anchorage in Majorca and I saw a shooting star
and I heard some splashes, I think there's dolphins around but I can't quite see them.
It's really cool laying back here actually you can see all the...
...navigation gear just up there, all the BMG gear. You can see the wind speed, what course we're headed on
It's just fantastic
We completed our first sail to Port Sóller on the north west side of the island
We're all pretty keen to check out this place and go and find my mate Oakey

[Switch to channel 71]
Roger, 7 - 1
Eyyy buddy!
Birthday! It's your birthday!
Yea it is too, how'd you know that?
Have you got a tender? Because we've got a nice tender anyway
Yea, sweet, I'm on the paddle, so I'm not coming that far
We'll get anchored then we'll be over in about 15
Yea sweet I'm having a shower anyway mate. I'll see you soon.
See you soon mate

Depth?
[3.9, 3.8. We're just getting a bit shallow]

Okay, this is a great spot then
[I think so too]

[Dropping down]
Dropping!

Good work team
[Good work]
Well done mate
Just wants to go

[Did we turn the nav lights off?]
I did, yea
Cool
Welcome
Took your time
[This is it]

Very cute
[She's a beauty mate]
She's got a lot of character

Where are you gonna take it?
[Not sure]
Thongs off everyone before you step on board
[Actually I don't care if you wear your thongs]

I can help you with that if we've got time
[Sure]

[What does it weigh Oakey?]
Do a little bit of decorating

[Seven, does that sound about right?]
Seven ton?

[Yeah]
That's pretty heavy
[Mmm, she's pretty old]

Have you looked at the sails?
[Nah]

You haven't looked at the sails?
[I've been pretty busy]
This is Port de Sóller, guarded by 2 lighthouses and is one of the most protected anchorages we've seen
Just over the hill here is the main town of Sóller and a tramway runs to and from here each day
carrying a stack of tourists. It's a pretty darn cute place
We took Oakey and the crew back to La Vagabonde to check out the boat and to rip into a few birthday drinks
It's Riley's birthday today and I forgot
Until Oakey said happy birthday this morning on the jetty, so I'm really sorry Riles
[That's alright, we were sailing, it's...]
No excuse
[Yes it is]
We're all having a birthday drink. [You'd just woken up] Well thank you, for forgiving me so easily.
He'll make you work for it later though, don't you worry.
Off camera I must admit I've been hammering her quite a bit.
We set up the canopy, wrong.
But it's our first try. It's just a little bit loosey goosey.
The canopy lady's not going to be happy with me when she sees this.
[Why not?] Because she taught me. She took like half an hour... [I don't this is French, I think it's Scottish]

[Really]
I cannot pee.
Hang on a second. Was that a joke?
Was it?
[What is the name?]
Osco, this is Osco

Hello dogs. They're so cute.
[He's cute, huh?]
Happy birthday Riley.
Thank you all for being here. 23.
[And how old are you?] I'm 59.
Right about here was in Riley started taking orders from behind the bar that wasn't his, then we went home. Happy birthday Riles.
How excited are you, out of 10, to be jumping of the back of your boat, and going for a swim?
Yeah, pretty close to 10
Riley!
Hello
He's naked!
I won't do that to Daniel. Not yet
It was a sunny day, and we pulled up the anchor for a hungover day sail.
Alright, we head south about an hour, it's about...
...about four miles. We're going to take nice slow down there
But best food on the island apparently is in this restaurant, little bay called Sa Foradada, so looking forward to a nice lunch today

[¡Increible!]
What's the depth?
Well, we're still in 17 metres here

[La Vagabonde!]
Hello!

[I liked your videos]
Awesome!

[Oakey's going in to check it out] 
No comment
[Alright]
Not sure if we're supposed to be up here or not
This is sick!
We left back to Sóller, heading into the breeze this time. We put the Code Zero up and we were on our way

[Alright good luck ok?]
See you soon anyway, we'll run into each other

Definitely
[Awesome]

Thanks for coming
[Maybe hopefully see you in Barcelona but we'll see how we go]

Nah well Italy whatever. We'll be around.
[Cool]
Don't you crash into my boat Jerry

Mate, that's a beautiful boat
[Yours is not bad either mate]
Nah, that looks that looks fantastic coming through the water.

Good on ya mate
[Have a good trip, good luck!]
See ya, enjoy!
We just popped out onto the front deck for a bit of a chat.
Yeah. We have just had the best week and
I'm waiting for something bad to happen. Usually on the water it's like you know something like one day's awesome
One day is terrible we haven't had a terrible day.
Touch wood
I had...
The best week of my life figuring out how this boat is and what it does and how

Comfortable you can arrive not exhausted all that sort of stuff. 
[Yeah]
Arriving here to meet my mate, Oakey, who's just about to embark on his adventure and being able to
discuss things, all of the little problems that he's having in the silly question that I was asking at that time when I bought my...
boat, it was just really

excellent. I have my birthday, and I say just the best place ever 
[One of the best]
This place is incredible.
So I suppose here we should say thank you to everyone

[We should] 
We should. Thank you for this lovely boat
Everyone that's watched
any one of our episodes even just once you're partially to blame for this.
Yeah, you guys did this. Legends, bunch of legends
I don't know what to say really it's....
Everything we hoped for.
I know we probably keep saying, like best thing this or best thing this, but that was the best week of my life..

and thank you yeah, and our boat's lovely
[It's so good, we love it, we love it!]
Every single day Elayna's come out and gone...
I feel like I have to whisper because we've got Daniel on board too and I don't want to keep saying like
how good's this boat, but like I'll always be whispering to Riley like Riley can you believe we own this boat?
It's just so, you can't, I just don't know what to do myself.
Honestly when it was blowing 28 knots, and we were just absolutely...
flying along like dead level when Elayna was cooking the stir fry

I had a moment
[Yeah]
I really did
I blew a fuse

Nothing will ever be the same again
[I can't wait to go sailing again]
And yeah, I guess that's all that we really had to say, that's our little...
report,
thing that we needed to deliver. We felt like we had to tell ya
